title: NHM Punjab Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for 300 Specialist Doctor Posts
description: National Health Mission (NHM Punjab) has declared the official notification for 2025. To fill up the 300 vacancies for Special Doctor Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the MBBS, MD/ MS, DNB, and Post Graduation can use this chance and apply for the NHM Punjab Recruitment 2025 . For more details, like the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for the posts mentioned below.
